logCommand

public <CommandReturnType,Key extends Serializable> void logCommand(Command<CommandReturnType,Key> toLog)
Logs command to a file named from commandIndex. Notice only Commands implementing the Serializable interface will be logged, as the other ones don't need to be logged.

restore

public <Key extends Serializable> StorageSpace<Key> restore(StorageSpace<Key> storageSpace)
When trying to restore, we first try to load file given by getSpaceFile(), create an object input stream on it, and read it content.

Specified by:
restore in interface SpacePersister
Parameters:
storageSpace - default storage space is none was memorized
Returns:
used storage space

                                               StorageSpace<Key> storageSpace)
Each second, the storage space will be resynchronized on disk

Specified by:
install in interface SpacePersister
Parameters:
executor - executor service used to perform actions
storageSpace - storage space that will be used
